title: Hero CTA: make "Start Your Project" text white and bold

requirements.summary: Ensure the landing page Hero primary CTA "Start Your Project" renders with white (#FFFFFF) bold text while remaining readable across interaction states.
acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page Hero section, the "Start Your Project" CTA text color is white (#FFFFFF) in its default state.
The "Start Your Project" CTA text remains bold.
The button remains readable and maintains sufficient contrast in hover/focus/active states without changing the button label text.

file_operations.description: Update the HeroSection primary CTA button styling so the "Start Your Project" label uses white text (#FFFFFF) and stays bold (e.g., ensure Tailwind classes enforce text-white (and hover/focus/active text-white as needed) while keeping existing background/hover background behavior unchanged).
